alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Taylor County through 445 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Perry, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Smith, Foley, Salem, Carbur, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Athena, Hampton Springs and Fenholloway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
